    Interface Description
    Runnable
    The functional interface used in the ReactionWaiter.onEvent(Runnable) method of ReactionWaiter.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ReactionEvent
    Represents a reaction event.
    ReactionListener
    This class is a sub class of ListenerAdapter from JDA.

Package de.kaktushose.discord.reactionwaiter Description

Created and maintained by Kaktushose.

IN NO EVENT SHALL THE AUTHORS OR COPYRIGHT HOLDERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR OTHER LIABILITY, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, ARISING FROM, OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR OTHER DEALINGS IN THE SOFTWARE.

This framework is build around the class ReactionWaiter.
It is used to create special listeners that will wait for reactions to be added. In doing so they will follow the restrictions defined by the constructor used.
ReactionEvent is a sub class of GuildMessageReactionAddEvent from JDA and provides some extra utilities.
ReactionListener implements the onGuildMessageReactionAdd method from JDA. It reviews all incoming GuildMessageReactionAddEvents.
Runnable is a functional interface used in the ReactionWaiter.onEvent(de.kaktushose.discord.reactionwaiter.Runnable) method of ReactionWaiter.
EmoteType is an enum with some emotes that might be frequently used. It can be used instead of the Emote from JDA.
